definition: to disperse/to diverge
to send out/to show (one's feeling)/to issue/to develop/to make a bundle of money/classifier for gunshots (rounds)
scattered/loose/to come loose/to fall apart/leisurely/powdered medicine
to scatter/to break up (a meeting etc)/to disperse/to disseminate/to dispel/(coll.) to sack

sentences.english: And if it spread much abroad in the skin, then the priest shall pronounce him unclean: it is a plague.
sentences.chinese: 若在皮上發散開了，祭司就要定他爲不潔淨，是災病。

sentences.english: Happiness would rise from the bottom of your heart when you're enjoying the hot springs.
sentences.chinese: 泡在阿爾山的溫泉裏，幸福則會從心底向外發散。

sentences.english: A new explanation is offered for this diverging "scissors gap" in this article.
sentences.chinese: 作者對這種發散的“剪刀差”態勢作了新的解釋。

sentences.english: A method is advanced to avoid of filter diffusion by using residual error prediction.
sentences.chinese: 提出一種基於預報殘差方法來檢測濾波發散問題。

sentences.english: I think it should be decanted now and allowed to breathe for a little while.
sentences.chinese: 我認爲現在應該輕輕倒，好讓氣味發散一下。

sentences.english: Moreover, when the weather is cold, the human urinates may follow the radiation "the steam".
sentences.chinese: 另外，天氣寒冷時，人排尿可伴隨發散“熱氣”。

sentences.english: A beam of high radiant power will have high divergence .
sentences.chinese: 高輻射功率的光束會有高的發散度。

sentences.english: After re-processing, the divergence difficulties could be overcome.
sentences.chinese: 經重整化處理後，發散困難得以解決。

sentences.english: This paper describes a diverging fibre that is analogous to a concave lens.
sentences.chinese: 本文討論一種發散型光學纖維，它類似於凹透鏡。

sentences.english: It is pointed out that dispelling exopathogens with pungent and warm drugs were the root of the therapeutic action.
sentences.chinese: 並提出“辛溫發散”乃是風藥治療作用的根本。

sentences.english: Sealing ring radial cracks are generally divergent, and may be one or more.
sentences.chinese: 密封環裂紋一般是徑向發散型的，可以是一條或多條。

sentences.english: Biv can with a lens be resolved to tidy white sunbeam once again.
sentences.chinese: 可以用一塊棱鏡將透射的白光發散出來。

sentences.english: The sea began to vibrate with waves that spread out in a circle.
sentences.chinese: 大海開始振動，波浪一圈一圈的向外發散。

sentences.english: The only stable solution is the diverging spherical wave.
sentences.chinese: 只有發散球面波纔是唯一穩定解。

sentences.english: The inner spiritual force disseminates through this inner eye.
sentences.chinese: 內在精神力量通過這第三隻眼發散。

sentences.english: Directional divergence can occur when the airplane lacks directional or weathercock stability.
sentences.chinese: 當飛機方向性穩定不夠時會造成方向性發散。

definition: anger/internal heat (TCM)
to emerge and grow/to develop

to sweat
